title: COTC
body: I am  a Blitzcrank main and in the new runes I cannot find my precious Courage of the colossus, is it gone? I searched through the resolve page and cannot find COTC.

replies.body: Although it's not exactly the same, there is a similar rune in the second tier of the Resolve tree! Font of Life makes it to where allied champions who attack enemies that you've impaired are healed for a percentage of your max health. Check it out in the new rune system!
